about_the_game:
Guide a nameless cat through the kingdom on a quest for the perfect dish, exploring picturesque villages, a mysterious dungeon and flavor-rich city. Forge unique friendships with characters of all sorts and dive into a mission that promises to be bigger than yourself, all seasoned with irresistible humor.

From relaxing side activities to hidden secrets, "Wandering Cat" is a delicious mix of exploration, adventure and the promise of a reward that will make you lick your whiskers!

  • Unique Culinary Exploration: Embark on an unprecedented culinary mission as you navigate through picturesque villages and a mysterious dungeon and flavor-rich city in search of the perfect dish.

  • Witty, Ironic Narrative: Dive into a story that defies genre clichés, full of humor and unexpected situations, keeping you as glued to the screen as it will make you smile.

  • Rich and Varied Interactions: Form unforgettable bonds with an eclectic cast of characters, both human and animal, each with their own story and personality.

  • Challenges and Rewards: Tackle a variety of puzzles and side quests that will test your ingenuity.

  • Immersive Soundtrack: Be enveloped by a soundtrack that perfectly captures the essence of the adventure, accompanying every discovery with notes that enhance the game's unique atmosphere.

Prepare your senses for an adventure that takes you beyond the ordinary, where bravery is measured not just in battles but in the quest for the supreme taste.

This project is a gift for my children, which is why I want to make it in the best way. If you want to support the project I will greatly appreciate your feedback!

name: Wandering Cat

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 / Windows® 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-2120 / AMD® FX 6350
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 460 (1GB) / AMD® Radeon™ HD 7870 (2GB) / Intel® Iris Pro™ 580 / Intel® Iris® Plus G7 / AMD® Radeon™ Vega 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 / Windows® 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4670K / AMD® Ryzen™ 5 2400G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 1650 (4GB) / AMD® Radeon™ R9 390X (8GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12

short_description: Guide a cat on a culinary journey in "Wandering Cat": explore, make friends and tackle adventures with humor. Are you ready for a meowtastic cat adventure?
